hypothesis_content.title: Crypto Momentum Reversal After 3-Day News Negativity
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC experiences 3 consecutive days of negative crypto news sentiment (headlines containing 'decline', 'wane', 'avoid', 'sell-off') AND BTC price remains within ±5% of its 20-day moving average, a momentum reversal occurs within the next 2 trading days with >65% probability.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Current market shows negative news sentiment but price holding near moving averages suggests oversold conditions in neutral regime. News negativity often creates temporary selling pressure that reverses when technicals remain intact.
entry_conditions: 3 consecutive days of negative crypto news sentiment score < -0.7 (using NLP analysis)
BTC price between 95% and 105% of 20-day SMA

exit_conditions.time_exit: 5 trading days if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If after 3 negative news days, BTC breaks below 95% of 20-day SMA and continues declining >5% over next 2 days in >60% of occurrences.
